name: John Brennan
summary: Former CIA Director whose security clearance was revoked by Trump and who called Trump's conduct 'nothing short of treasonous' and a threat to national security.

keyStatements.quote: Donald Trump's press conference performance in Helsinki rises to & exceeds the threshold of 'high crimes & misdemeanors.' It was nothing short of treasonous.
keyStatements.context: After Trump's Helsinki summit with Putin

keyStatements.quote: When the full extent of your venality, moral turpitude, and political corruption becomes known, you will take your rightful place as a disgraced demagogue in the dustbin of history.
Trump is drunk on power and he's destroying our democracy.

timeline.event: Left CIA when Trump took office

credibility.background: Former CIA Director, spent 25 years at CIA, senior intelligence official
